# delegateQueue

**Instance Property**

The dispatch queue through which the session calls your delegate methods.

## Declaration

```swift
var delegateQueue: dispatch_queue_t? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `nil` (the default), the session calls your delegate methods on the main queue.

## Responding to events

- **delegate**: An object you provide to receive captured video images and tracking information, or to respond to changes in session status.
- **ARSessionDelegate**: Methods you can implement to receive captured video frame images and tracking state from an AR session.
- **ARSessionObserver**: Methods you can implement to respond to changes in the state of an AR session.
